#summary Source code description and facts

= Firmware =
XARIAS is an Open Source project. The source code of the firmware is written in C language and is available on GPLv3 license. Currently you can download verion v02 only from SVN. To compile the source code you will need avr-gcc and avr-libc [http://www.nongnu.org/avr-libc/].

= Schematics and PCB =
All schematics are designed usin gEDA Open Source tool ([http://www.geda.seul.org/]) and PCB is designed using Open Source PCB tool ([http://pcb.sourceforge.net/]).
